text: Ezɨ Israelia mɨdorozimɨn bar gavgavigha Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba adugha zuima me are. Ezɨ Devit uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko, men 7,000plan karisbagh isɨn ikia mɨsozir gumaziba ko 40,000plan nguazimɨn tuiva mɨsozir gumazibav soghezɨ, me ariaghire. Egha uaghan Sirian mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanim Sobakɨn mɨsoghezɨ, a danganir kamrama areme.
